E9C8FE7E42707A18C2C3069EFE63D65D: Determines how much damage the device can take before destruction.
60EDA2BC43CF2B9BAD2CFB8FA3FF1977: Spawns a pilotable helicopter that can be configured
048099FE4ED3548935303C9512F7AE73: Spawns a pilotable helicopter that can be configured.
8D594DF84D4107FAFCE632ABDD40DB64: Spawns a pilotable helicopter that can be configured.
C0082F1B40786AF0AA54AD88A28638B3: Spawns a pilotable helicopter that can be configured.
C0728B4041BD67E933FF7D818444CDCC: Spawns a pilotable helicopter that can be configured.
D797453044B0887947FB6F97EA8A68D2: Spawns a pilotable helicopter that can be configured.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.On Player Ent: A player enters the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.On Player Exi: A player exits the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.On Vehicle Sp: A vehicle is spawned or respawned.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Apply OffRoad: Apply off-road tires to the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.FuelUseMultip: Controls how quickly the vehicle will use fuel while driving.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Vehicle Healt: Determines how much damage the vehicle can take before destruction.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Skydive on Ex: Determines if players skydive out of the vehicle. (Skydiving players can use the glider regardless of island settings)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Vehicle Indes: Determines if the Vehicle can be destroyed by damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Destroy when: Determines if the Vehicle will destroy itself when stuck underwater.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.EnableRespawn: Determines if the Vehicle will respawn after being destroyed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Fuel Consumpt: Determines if the spawned vehicle uses fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Enabled Durin: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. If set to CREATE ONLY, will only be enabled while editing your Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Max Random St: Determines the maximum random fuel percentage the vehicle will spawn with. If Max is less than or equal to Min, the vehicle will spawn with default fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Min Random St: Determines the minimum random fuel percentage the vehicle will spawn with. If Max is less than or equal to Min, the vehicle will spawn with default fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Visible Durin: Determines whether the device is visible during the game. This does affect its collision properties.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.SupportsWraps: Determines whether the spawned vehicle supports wraps.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Disable.Descr: Disable the Vehicle Spawner, stopping it from spawning any more vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Enable.Descri: Enable the Vehicle Spawner, allowing it to spawn vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Allowed Class: If set to All, All Classes (including players with NO CLASS) are affected. Otherwise, the chosen Class will be used to determine the Affects Class effect. ANY CLASS - Players with a Class assigned, regardless of what Class it is. NO CLASS - Players without any assigned class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Destroy Vehic: If the vehicle that this spawner created still exists, destroy it.
ON will destroy an already spawned vehicle when this spawner is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Pop All Tires: Pop all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to pop.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Repair All Ti: Repair all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to repair.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Repair Vehicl: Restore the spawned vehicle to full health.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Remove Tire M: Revert to road tires on the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Assigns Drive: Seats the player that instigated the message as the spawned vehicle's driver.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Random Starti: Spawn the vehicle with a random percentage of fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Respawn Vehic: Spawns the vehicle (Destroying the existing vehicle if it still exists).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Activating Te: The Team this device belongs to.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Starting Fuel: The percentage of fuel in the vehicle's fuel tank at spawn.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Water Destruc: When the vehicle becomes too deep in water to drive, destroy it after this delay.
When the vehicle is destroyed, respawn it after this delay. (The first vehicle spawned does not use this delay.)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Hoagie_Spawner_V2_C.Respawn Vehic: YES will spawn a vehicle when the device is enabled. ONLY IF NEEDED will not reset an existing vehicle.
